snippet: Pep Guardiola believes his Manchester City side have to match Liverpool's intensity at the Reds' Anfield fortress on Saturday if they are to avoid ending the year on a deflating note....
lead_paragraph: Pep Guardiola believes his Manchester City side have to match Liverpool's intensity at the Reds' Anfield fortress on Saturday if they are to avoid ending the year on a deflating note.

headline.main: Guardiola Demands That City Match Liverpool Intensity
headline.print_headline: Guardiola Demands That City Match Liverpool Intensity
